title: A Craft Beer Festival Supporting American Cancer Society
desc: You already know and love Bowlero for making sure you keep a fun schedule of extracurricular activities - now they're hosting the Craft Beer Festival at its Mar Vista location and you're invited.? Along with your admission, you'll enjoy beer samples from local breweries and entertainment. Plus you'll receive one complimentary game of bowling at the Mar Vista location. And best of all, a portion of all profits goes to the American Cancer Society! $20 ($50 value) for one admission package, including: Must be 21 or older to participate Bowlero Mar Vista  Website  |  Facebook  | Instagram@ Bowlerobowl
